base_description: Tall, white shelving unit with cabinet base.
part_description: Five shelves arranged vertically above a cabinet. The cabinet is rectangular, positioned at the base. Shelves are evenly spaced, supported by two vertical side posts.
internal_interaction_description: The vertical posts support the shelves, ensuring stability and even spacing. The cabinet at the base adds structural integrity and provides additional storage. Shelves are fixed, allowing for organized vertical storage.
external_interaction_description: The shelving unit can hold various items like books or decor. It can be placed against a wall for stability and space efficiency. The cabinet provides concealed storage, interacting with users by offering easy access to stored items.
